meanings.definition: In a rare or unusual manner
meanings.sent1: She spoke uncommonly softly, barely audible to the others.
meanings.sent2: He rarely, if ever, behaves uncommonly in public.
meanings.sent3: The cat uncommonly decided to take a bath in the fish tank.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone uncommonly bright in the clear night sky.
meanings.sent5: The magician's tricks were uncommonly impressive, leaving the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Not frequently or commonly seen or experienced
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an uncommonly old artifact from ancient times.
meanings.sent2: It is uncommonly cold for this time of year.
meanings.sent3: The unicorn was an uncommonly common sight in the enchanted forest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as uncommonly beautiful as a rare flower in bloom.
meanings.sent5: The detective noticed an uncommonly suspicious behavior in the suspect.
